auto_play:
Play the chart automatically
(DEBUG: can toggle midsong by pressing back [ESC or Backspace by default])
legacy_score: Gain score based purely on ratings instead of time, like old base game/psych
ghost_tapping:
Does pressing a key with no hittable notes cause a miss?
Note: this will instantly kill you if you press while its false lol
skip_transitions: Skip the transition that happens when you change scenes
scroll_type: Choose the direction you want the notes to travel
center_strums:
Centers player strums
(May or may not apply depending on scroll type!)
hitsound_volume:
How loud should the hitsounds be?
(0 to disable)
offset:
How early/late the music is
(for headsets/speakers with audio delay)
epic_window:
How tight the 
"Epic"
window is to hit
sick_window:
How tight the 
"Sick"
window is to hit
good_window:
How tight the 
"Good"
window is to hit
bad_window:
How tight the 
"Bad"
window is to hit
fps:
im sure you can guess
0 = No Limit (Can be intensive!)
vsync:
Enable or disable Vsync
If enabled, depending on which one, the FPS will mostly be locked to refresh rate
allow_rpc: Show the "Now Playing" activity on your discord
basic_play: If checked, only the strums and notes will load, with no stage elements
auto_pause: Should the game freeze once the window loses focus?
splash_sprite: Choose the note splash sprite you want
note_splashes:
When should a Note Splash happen?
(Both: Epic & Sick, All: Every note hit [:sob:])
behind_strums: Layer the sustains behind the strums
rating_cam:
Which camera should the ratings and combo appear on?
(None = Disable)
chart_grid: The default option for the "Show Chart Grid" in the chart editor
